mapper.sql: SELECT c.id AS contact_id, c.name AS contact_name, ct.code AS contact_type, c.address AS contact_address, p.lastname1 AS person_lastname1, p.lastname2 AS person_lastname2 FROM Contact c LEFT JOIN Person p ON c.id = p.contact JOIN ContactType ct ON ct.id = c.contactType WHERE ct.id = 1
mapper.select: SELECT c.id AS id, c.name AS name, ct.code AS type, c.address AS address, p.lastname1 AS lastName1, p.lastname2 AS lastName2 FROM Contact c LEFT JOIN Person p ON c.id = p.contact JOIN ContactType ct ON ct.id = c.contactType WHERE ct.id = 1 AND c.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Person (contact, lastname1, lastname2) values(#{id}, #{lastName1}, #{lastName2})
mapper.update: UPDATE Person SET lastname1 = #{lastName1}, lastname2 = #{lastName2} WHERE contact = #{id}
